education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Web Design and Development

professionalExperience.title: Software Development Intern
bullets: Built a feature in React that helps prevents 95% of potential data loss from network instability, sessions timing out, etc.
Worked on a team developing an internal application to increase understanding across the organization of what eachteam was working on.
Successfully led the effort to set up unit tests for an Apollo GraphQL server, leveraging Jest to ensure reliability and performance.
Contributed over 70 commits across multiple repositories in the organization.
Refactored the application's Jira integration, creating a more robust and user-friendly interface for project creation and management.
Collaborated with a team of developers to create a new feature that allows users to view and manage their data in a more intuitive way.
Actively participated in code reviews, improving coding skills, learning best practices, and sharing knowledge with peers to enhance overall team performance.
Worked independently and collaboratively in a team environment, demonstrating effective problem-solving and communication skills.

professionalExperience.title: Graphic Designer
bullets: Analyzed, designed, and prepared up to 10 wrap orders for snowmobiles for customers per day, based on their desires and feedback.

professionalExperience.title: Computer Programming Instructor
bullets: Taught up to 4 classes a week to help 15 individual young students learning computer programming, including being asked to specifically be the instructor by parents, and taking over multiple classes from other instructors.

professionalExperience.title: Production and Design Assistant
bullets: Helped prepare and create graphic files for production, as well as assist in the screen printing process for apparel.

professionalExperience.title: Computer Lab Assistant and Programming Tutor
bullets: While a senior in high school, tutored college students to be best able to find solutions to their computer science assignments.
Taught programming principles and helped them to better understand the things they were learning in their classes.

projects.title: Hebrew Lexicon App
projects.description: In 2 weeks, built an app using React with Javascript, HTML, and CSS that displays and allows searching through words from Strong's Hebrew Lexicon.

projects.title: Hero Guy: Secret Mission Game
projects.description: Using HTML, CSS, and Javascript, and over about 8 weeks, developed this jackbox-style game similar to mafia.

projects.title: Flim Flam Epigram
projects.description: Developed the frontend and worked with small team of 3 people to develop a party game similar to the game "Quiplash" over the course of about 10 weeks
